description: This is an HTML file that defines the structure and styling for a web-based database viewer interface, including scripts for dynamic data fetching and UI interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads the list of databases from the server and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets UI state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a specific database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table with fetched records.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell based on value type.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
